title: Happy Birthday Your Excellency! Tribute to the Greatest living Legend of our times: President Mahinda Rajapaksa
content: By Dr. Telli C. Rajaratnam Ceylon obtained independence from the British Rule in 1948 by smooth transition after India gained its independence. We honour our Patriots who contributed towards that endeavour. But the crucial factor is the independence gained by defeating terror under the leadership of President Mahinda Rajapaksa in the midst of so much…
